title: Axiomatic State Manifest (ASM)
description: Canonical accumulator for all ACV component validation results collected during GSEP-C Stages S02 through S10, used as input for S11 P-01 PASS determination.

uma_metric_results.description: Results related to Utility Maximization Axiom (I).

TEMM.description: Target Execution Utility Metric ($S_{01}$, calculated in S08).

UFRM.description: Baseline Required Utility Metric ($S_{02}$, from GAX config).

CFTM.description: Minimum required utility margin ($Îµ$, from GAX config).

uma_pass.description: Result of TEMM >= (UFRM + CFTM) (Checked in S10).

context_attestation.description: Results related to Context Attestation Axiom (II).

ECVM.description: Environmental Context Verification Status (Validated in S06).

integrity_vetoes.description: Results related to Axiomatic Integrity Axiom (III). Absence of veto is required.

p01_finality_result.description: Final result of the S11 P-01 PASS calculation. Requires UMA_pass AND ECVM AND NOT (PVLM OR MPAM OR ADTM).
